question: What is the world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour?

steps.content: What is the world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour?
Plan: 1) Search for the world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour.
The world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour is 16.61 kilometers, set by Aaron Yoder in 2015.
The world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour is 16.61 kilometers, set by Aaron Yoder in 2015.

true_answer: The world record for the longest distance run backwards in one hour is 16.61 kilometers, set by Aaron Yoder in 2015.
